thread.title: Stanley Black & Decker to buy Sears' Craftsman brand for $900 million
thread.title_full: Stanley Black & Decker to buy Sears' Craftsman brand for $900 million

title: Stanley Black & Decker to buy Sears' Craftsman brand for $900 million

organizations.name: bloomberg | getty images stanley black & decker inc.

text:
Stanley Black & Decker to buy Sears' Craftsman brand for $900 million 4 Mins Ago SHARES David Paul Morris | Bloomberg | Getty Images Stanley Black & Decker Inc. power drills are displayed for sale at a Home Depot Inc. store in Colma, California, U.S., on Wednesday, April 23, 2014. 
Power tool maker Stanley Black & Decker said it agreed to buy Sears Holdings Craftsman tool brand for $900 million in cash. 
Sears had been looking at options for its tools business as it struggles to stanch a year-long decline in sales. Related Securities
